Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Paul Ryan nominated Joel Osteen as the new House Chaplain, when in fact he did not.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a rumor that originated from a satirical post on a message board.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the rumor is true without verifying the facts.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the rumor was spread as a satirical post and not based on any factual information.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Paul Ryan did not nominate Joel Osteen as the new House Chaplain.
Understate: This bias does not apply to the claim.
Falters at times: This bias does not apply to the claim.
